name: Photography in Tokyo
description: This trip is designed to be personalized - based on your interests, the season, the weather that day, if it's a weekday vs a weekend, time of day (day vs evening), what festivals are going on (there is ALWAYS a festival somewhere), how many shrines you want to visit, if you'd rather see gardens, or both, how much you want to walk, if you want to hit the used camera shops or not, etc. Get in touch and I'll let you know what the highlights could be for your visit (dates).  (all the photos below were taken by me)
